unnormalised: Okay, here's an article about League Transfers with a conversational tone, Indian references, and aiming for around 400 words:
normalised: Okay, here's the normalized version of your article:

unnormalised: League Transfers: The Kabaddi Bazaar is Open!
normalised: Alright folks, grab your chai and settle in, because the kabaddi season is almost upon us, and you know what that means: League transfers are in full swing! Just like Diwali shopping, everyone’s looking for the best deals and the brightest crackers… err, I mean players!

unnormalised: Alright folks, grab your chai and settle in, because the kabaddi season is almost upon us, and you know what that means: League transfers are in full swing! Just like Diwali shopping, everyone’s looking for the best deals and the brightest crackers… err, I mean players!
normalised: This year, the buzz is all about which team can snatch up young raider Rohan Sharma from Patna. The kid’s got lightning feet and a killer dubki, and I heard whispers that Telugu Titans are offering him a whopping rupee one point five crore. That’s serious biryani money, folks! Will he stay loyal to his home team, or will the allure of a bigger paycheck and a new challenge be too much to resist? It's the age-old question, isn’t it?

unnormalised: This year, the buzz is all about which team can snatch up young raider Rohan Sharma from Patna. The kid’s got lightning feet and a killer dubki, and I heard whispers that Telugu Titans are offering him a whopping Rs. 1.5 crore. That’s serious biryani money, folks! Will he stay loyal to his home team, or will the allure of a bigger paycheck and a new challenge be too much to resist? It's the age-old question, isn’t it?
normalised: Then there’s seasoned defender Lakshmi Kant Jha. Word on the street is that he's considering a move down south to Bengaluru Bulls. At thirty two, he’s not quite a spring chicken anymore, but his experience and tactical nous are invaluable. Imagine him partnering with their existing defensive wall – opponents would need divine intervention, or maybe a good dose of Onam sadhya to fill them up so they can't run fast, to even score! The Bulls desperately need someone to tighten their defense after last season's semi-final heartbreak, so this could be a match made in kabaddi heaven.

unnormalised: Then there’s seasoned defender Lakshmi Kant Jha. Word on the street is that he's considering a move down south to Bengaluru Bulls. normalised: Of course, the transfer window isn't just about big names. Teams are also scouting for promising young talent from all corners of India. Remember that district-level tournament in Haryana last month? Several scouts from P R O Kabaddi teams were spotted there, notebooks in hand, looking for the next Pardeep Narwal. Keep an eye out for some surprise signings – maybe a relative unknown from a small village who suddenly becomes a household name. That's the magic of the league, isn’t it?

unnormalised: Of course, the transfer window isn't just about big names. Teams are also scouting for promising young talent from all corners of India. Remember that district-level tournament in Haryana last month? Several scouts from Pro Kabaddi teams were spotted there, notebooks in hand, looking for the next Pardeep Narwal. Keep an eye out for some surprise signings – maybe a relative unknown from a small village who suddenly becomes a household name. That's the magic of the league, isn’t it?
normalised: And don't forget the coaches! It's not just the players who are on the move. Coach Anjali Iyer, who led the Bengal Warriors to victory two seasons ago, is rumoured to be heading to Jaipur Pink Panthers. Her strategic brilliance and motivational skills are legendary, and Jaipur fans are already dreaming of another championship. This transfer, if it happens, could completely reshape the dynamics of the league.

normalised: The pressure is on for all the teams to finalize their squads before the deadline. Who will land the biggest fish? Who will unearth the hidden gems? And who will make the strategic masterstrokes that ultimately lead to lifting the trophy? Only time will tell. But one thing's for sure: this transfer season is going to be a nail-biter, full of drama, surprises, and enough twists and turns to make your head spin! Get ready for some serious kabaddi action! Keep watching this space for all the latest updates and rumors from the kabaddi transfer market!
